item.title: Media Action Insight Blog - BBC Blogs
item.description:
â€œMedia Action Insight aims to inform policy, research and practice on the role of media around BBC Media Action's priority themes of governance and rights, health, resilience and humanitarian response. It is a space for our staff and guest bloggers to share analysis, insight and research findings.â€
